abstract.t: This document describes extensions to Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for the setup of Receiver-Driven Traffic-Engineered point-to-multipoint (P2MP) and multipoint-to- multipoint (MP2MP)Label Switched Paths (LSPs) in Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS)networks.
